tagline: Minimal, fast, beautiful — SvelteKit apps that compile away the complexity
pros: Obsessive about bundle size and performance
Strong design sensibility — CSS, animation, motion design
Simplifies ruthlessly — deletes more code than they write
cons: Svelte ecosystem is smaller — fewer libraries and community resources
Contrarian streak can slow team alignment
Less suited for complex enterprise apps requiring a larger framework ecosystem

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
